entry.content:
英语学习

扇贝单词

  • deplore dispatch detective decriminate despoil
  • heed nourish refurbish ingredient confine
  • expedition expend

    dispatch : send to a particular destination

    heed : pay attention to

    cofine : pervent it from

    expedition : organized journey that is made for a particular purpose

    verbiage : too many words to make speech difficult to understand

    frugal : not expensive

    assassinate: murder as a political act

    ambivalent : uncertain

    conspicuous: can be noticed easily

    contender : someone who takes part in a competition

    picturesque: attractive

    rug : carpet covers a smaller area

    collaborate: work together

    satiric : ironic

    TuesMagique

    Does Your tummy ever hurt after eating onions and garlic?This is the sad reason why.

    cramp: a painful and involuntary muscular contraction; spasm,muscle spasm

    nausea: sickness

    hallucination：illusoryperception; a common symptom of severe mental disorder

    topical:pertaining to the surface of a body part

    葱姜蒜过敏，文章过难，我人无

    吉他

    乐理基础

    频率/唱名/音名/全全半 全全全半/本位音/高音 倍高音 倍倍高音/标准调弦：e2 b1 g1 d1 a e

    B站收藏了一些基础练习

    技术好文 电源向

    最近画PCB的时候刚接触电源这方面的知识，mark一下。

    电源保护基础电路（基于PMOS）

    防止电源反接->二极管

    存在问题：正向存在压降，存在功耗。

    解决办法：使用肖特基二极管，但是仍然存在功耗消耗。

    解决办法：PMOS的Vgs<0的时导通，>0时截止。且Rds_on很小，功耗很低。

    具体电路：

    LDO和DCDC的一些区别

    LDO：low dropout regulator，低压差线性稳压器。

    DC-DC主要由buck（降压），boost（升压），buck-boost（升降压）三种构成。

    LDO问题1：效率低，大约等于输出电压比输入电压，所以当输出电压和输入电压相差较大时，效率低且功耗大。

    LDO问题2：最大输出电流只有几百mA，而DCDC最大输出电流有几A甚至更大。

    LDO优点1：DC/DC工作在开关状态导致其纹波/噪声要比LDO差，所以在设计时比较敏感的电路尽量选择LDO供电。

    LDO优点2：LDO相对DCDC成本要低，外围电路要简单。

周末

打游戏 看电竞春晚

心情

想养一只猫猫 带回家了

英语学习

扇贝单词

candid: honest.

vow: promise.|vote: to choose sb.

satiric: ironic.

frugal: not expensive.

dispel: stop people having some idea or feeling.

verbiage: verbose.use too many words.

consent: agree.

invasive: invade adj.

hygiene: personal hygiene.

vicious: violent and cruel.

rug:small carpet.

conspicuous:be noticed easily

mellow:pleasant,soft.

notation:a set of written symbols.

ambivalent:uncertain.

gravel:small stones used to make paths.|gravity:Newton’s law of gravity.

narrative:story.

dogged:determined to continue with sth.

confine:prevent.

apportion:apportion something ->how much should be given.

inquire:ask for information about it.

bustle:v.busy.

interfere:get involved in sth.

creep:move quietly and slowly.|steep: rising or falling quickly, not gradually

swindle:defraud.

repute:reputation.

英国王室，听不懂，人无。

rug: small carpet.

swindle: deceive.

invasive: invade.

disorder: badly organized.

nomadic: travel from place to place and do not have a settled home.

tame: a tame animal is one that is not afraid of humans.

英语

扇贝单词

bloc: group of countries which have similar political aims and interests.

astonishment: feeling of great surprise.

aisle: long narrow gap that people can walk along.| /aIl/

cotton: cotton cloth.|cartoon

hook: used for catching or holding things.

patronage: sponsor.

insanity: insane - ity. foolish.

bride: woman who is getting married.

TuesMagique

The coming splurge on northern infrastructure

  • 长难句 because it underplays the potential of big projects to boost the economy of the areas that benefit from them.
  • soft money,hard hats.

    白嫖流利说

    From macaques to crabs, wildlife faces threat from face masks

  • hazard: a source of danger
  • marine: connected with the sea and the creatures and plants that live there
  • ensnare: (formal) to make sb / sth unable to escape from a difficult situation or from a person who wants to control them
  • mandate: the authority to do sth, given to a government or other organization by the people who vote for it in an election

跟吴老师见了很多厉害的人，飞骧科技的COO，就是我梦想的自己十年后的样子。

英语

扇贝单词

insanity: state of being insane.

concede: admit,often unwillingly,that it is true or correct.

ambassador: an important official who lives in a foreign coutry.

reproach: reproach someone,show that you are disappointed,upset,or angry.

patronage: patron-age.

malicious: intented to harm people or their reputation.

ripe: fruit is fully grown and ready to eat.|rape

militia: like an army but not professional.

crave: want to have it very much.|carve: to make objects, patterns, etc. by cutting away material from wood or stone.

desolate: empty of people and lacking in comfort.

culmination: climax.

annual: happen once every year.

exhaustion: state of being so tired.

paradoxical: involves two facts or qualities which seem to contradict each other.

sparing: careful to use or give only a little of sth.

greasy: has grease on something.

henceforth: from now on.

白嫖流利说

The botched launch of “Cyberpunk 2077”

botched: to spoil sth by doing it badly.

polish: an act of polishing sth.

rather than coasting on a reputation built up in the century before.|coasting on用的很好

farce: a situation or an event that is so unfair or badly organized that it becomes ridiculous

The game was launched while still littered with bugs.|littered with用的很好

The peculiar cocktail of success and embarrassing failure of “Cyberpunk 2077” is an allegory for Europe’s video-game industry at large.|cocktail本指鸡尾酒 allegory本指寓言

FPC软板设计

导体和柔性介质之间使用胶粘合，介电常数比较低。阻抗匹配一致性较差。

常用介质材料：聚酰亚胺(polyimide)，简称PI，厚度范围是0.5mil到5mil。|聚酯(polyester)，简称PET，厚度范围是1mil到5mil，焊接性能和抗撕裂能力差。

导电材料：铜箔(Copper foil)：根据制造方式分类，包括电解铜箔和压延铜箔。|导电涂料：如银浆。

为什么硬板绿油比较多：因为透光性比较好。

连接方式：1.板对板连接器-需要公母连接器配对使用；2.Hotbar（使用设备进行组装，进行两个材料热压处理，处理采用电镀铅锡的方式）；3.软硬结合板。

英语

扇贝单词

paradoxical: involves two facts which seem to contradict each other.

crave: want to have something very much.

blaze: fire blaze/light - extremely bright.

desolate: empty of people and lacking in comfort.

exhaustion: being so tired that you have no energy left.

concede: admit unwillingly.

disputable: dispute - able.

wholesome: to have a positive influence on people’s behaviour.

civilize: educate and improve their way of life.

heroine: female hero.|heroin

rash: without thinking carefully.|rash of - plenty of.

radical: 1.important and great in degree. 2.radical people - conservative people.

subordination: subordinate -> tion

白嫖流利说

Obama-endorsed and wearing gold-clipped braids and Oprah-gifted earrings | endorse: declare one’s public approval or support of.

Explored grief, redemption and recovery, and wowed the world.|grief redemption.

Our people diverse and beautiful will emerge, battered and beautiful.这句话好难读懂

Spoken word is a craft and a powerful art form, from the cadence to the delivery, to the subtle choreography.

Poets are vendors of aspiration and are always fashioning together depictions of a better tomorrow, but it’s fair to ask if they are ever truly listened to in political spaces.|vendor这个词做的比较好

inauguration: the beginning or introduction of a system, policy, or period.

paramount: more important than anything else;

But benefits are subject to complicated rules meant to exclude the undeserving.

systems labelled parents

外刊阅读

花了一块钱买了流利说阅读一周体验 发现和金老师给我的完全不一样…

A Lunar New Year Message From The Bidens

  • renewal: a situation in which sth begins again after a pause or an interruption”如：a renewal of interest in traditional teaching methods.
  • Amid the pain of this pandemic, the loss of lives and livelihoods, we’ve seen another tragedy: racism, harassment, hate crimes against Asian Americans and Pacific Islanders. 偶遇今天背的单词harsaament.
  • That’s why I signed an executive order condemning racism and xenophobia against Asian Americans and Pacific Islanders, and directed federal government to advance racial equality in all that we do. 偶遇之前背过的condemn.
  • The Year of the Ox reminds us our resilience and perseverance. resilience好词.
  • resilience: the ability of people or things to feel better quickly after sth unpleasant, such as shock, injury, etc.

entry.title: hexo博客多设备云同步管理
entry.content:
hexo博客多设备云同步管理

为什么hexo本身没办法多设备同步

首先，需要了解hexo是生成静态网页上传到github上面。

因此是没有源文件的，所以没办法直接git clone下来进行多设备同步。

（因为git clone下来的是hexo根据markdown生成的一些静态网页）

那怎么办？

解决思路：在这个项目中新建一个branch专门用于存放源文件，master分支由hexo管理，

而新的branch可以由多设备进行同步。

具体方法：

  1. 先新建一个文件夹，git clone当前的blog -主要是为了拿到.git文件
  2. 删除其他文件，只留下.git文件。
  3. 新建一个分支hexo。git add –all||git commit n||git push origin hexo||测试一下看看是不是空文件。
  4. 测试成功之后把.git转到博客的源目录下，删除theme下的git等。
  5. 重新git add –all||git commit n||git push origin hexo。
  6. 大功告成。

    一些坑

  7. mac需要git clone对应的hexo分支，默认还是master。
  8. 直接在clone下的文件进行hexo操作会有问题，根据提示uninstall install就好了。
  9. 为什么不直接在博客的源目录下直接建分支？

    因为直接建分支会引发一些乱七八糟的冲突（试图理解过但是失败了）

  • 完结散花，这篇是mac写的。

entry.title: acwing
entry.content:
AcWing专栏

基础语法知识点

变量及输入输出

  • 两个重要的头文件; iostream和cstdio; iostream - cin/cout | cstdio - scanf/printf;
  • .h将所有的名字放在global namespace中，而新的方式（cstdio）是放在namespace std中。
  • scanf/printf 效率比 cin/cout 高;
  • %d %f %c %lf %lld;
  • %05d - 前面补0/ %-05d 后面补0/ %5.1lf 前面补空(5代表最小宽度 可多不可少)
  • ++a a++| c = a++; d = ++a;|d比c大;

    判断

  • && 的短路原则（前面不满足就不执行后面的）
